response.overview: Coffee And Cigarettes is a collection of eleven films from cult director Jim Jarmusch. Each film hosts star studded cast of extremely unique individuals who all share the common activities of conversing while drinking coffee and smoking cigarettes.
response.title: Coffee and Cigarettes

cast.name: Jack White
cast.character: Jack (segment "Jack Shows Meg His Tesla Coil")

cast.name: Meg White
cast.character: Meg (segment "Jack Shows Meg His Tesla Coil")

release_dates.note: Film by the Sea Film Festival
